summary: This bill, the Livestock Indemnity Program Enhancement Act of 2025, amends the Agricultural Act of 2014 to provide additional payments to farmers for unborn livestock deaths due to specified conditions.  The Secretary of Agriculture will determine the payment rate, up to 85% of the rate for the lowest weight class of livestock. The payment amount will be determined based on the type of livestock lost and factors specified in the bill, considering livestock species and the number of offspring per gestation cycle. The bill defines unborn livestock death losses.
